fusetools.office_tools.Outlook¶

class fusetools.office_tools.Outlook[source]¶

Bases: object

Functions for interacting with Outlook.

Methods

delete_outlook_meetings

Deletes meetings from Outlook calendar

download_attachments

Downloads attachments from an Outlook folder..

get_outlook_appts

Download Outlook appointment details into a Pandas DataFrame.

outlook_folder_df

Downloads an Outlook folder’s emails details into a Pandas DataFrame.

send_email

Sends an email via Outlook.

send_meeting

Sends a meeting invitation via Outlook.
classmethod delete_outlook_meetings(df_del)[source]¶

Deletes meetings from Outlook calendar

Parameters

df_del – Pandas DataFrame of meetings to delete with subjects

Returns

Deleted calendar meeting

classmethod download_attachments(outlook_folder_name, dl_dir, attch_list_file, attch_list_file_sht=False, start_date=False, end_date=False)[source]¶

Downloads attachments from an Outlook folder..

Parameters

  • outlook_folder_name – Name of Outlook folder to download attachments from.

  • dl_dir – Directory to download attachments to.

  • attch_list_file – CSV or Excel file with list of attachment criteria.

  • attch_list_file_sht – Name of Excel sheet if ‘attch_list_file’ is an Excel file.

  • start_date – Minimum received date for email.

  • end_date – Maximum received date for email.

Returns

Downloaded attachments from Outlook folder.

classmethod get_outlook_appts(sub_str=False)[source]¶

Download Outlook appointment details into a Pandas DataFrame.

Parameters

sub_str – String to filter subject lines by for certain emails (optional)

Returns

Pandas DataFrame Outlook appointments

classmethod outlook_folder_df(folder_name)[source]¶

Downloads an Outlook folder’s emails details into a Pandas DataFrame.

Parameters

folder_name – Name of Outlook folder to download.

Returns

Pandas DataFrame of Outlook folder’s email details.

classmethod send_email(send_to, subject, body, html_body=False, attachment=None)[source]¶

Sends an email via Outlook.

Parameters

  • send_to – Recipient(s) to send email to

  • subject – Email subject line

  • body – Email body text

  • html_body – Email body in HTML format (optional)

  • attachment – Email Attachment (optional)

Returns

Sent email via Outlook

classmethod send_meeting(subject, start_date, duration, location, sender, recipients)[source]¶

Sends a meeting invitation via Outlook.

Parameters

  • subject – Meeting subject

  • start_date – Start date of meeting

  • duration – Duration of meeting

  • location – Location of meeting

  • sender – Sender email address

  • recipients – Recipient(s) to send meeting invitatiin to

Returns

Sent email invitation via Outlook
